statements: DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE algorithm_name='Algorithm A';
DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE accuracy <= 0.8 AND algorithm_name = 'Random Forest';
DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE algorithm_id = 1 AND performance_metric = 'Accuracy';
DELETE FROM algorithm_metadata WHERE algorithm_name = 'Random Forest' AND algorithm_id = 2;
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE algorithm_id = 2 AND trend_data->>'type' = 'positive';
DELETE FROM AlgorithmDetails WHERE author = 'John Doe'
